The paine of pleasure, describing in a perfect mirror, the miseries of man. Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.
[44] p.
[H. Bynneman?, [London : 1583?]
Caption title. In verse. Imprint suggested by STC. Leaf B1r has catchword "What". "The authors dreame" begins on E4v. Imperfect: lacking t.p. and leaf A2; print show-through. Signatures: A-E⁴ F². Reproduction of original in the British Library.
